generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, viewed from the perspective of a vehicle's dashboard.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian path is visible along the right side of the road, with people walking on it.
- building: A white building with multiple windows is visible in the background on the left side of the image.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the greenery.
- fence: A metal fence is installed along the top of the stone wall, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several black poles are visible along the edge of the road and sidewalk, likely for traffic control or signage.
- traffic sign: A blue circular "No Stopping" sign and a directional sign with arrows and text are visible on poles along the sidewalk.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in patches along the sidewalk and behind the stone wall.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper left corner.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including adults and a child.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo on the dashboard indicates the perspective is from inside a car.
